summary: The Nobel Prize in Physics is a Nobel Prize in the science of Physics.
full_text:
Sir Edward Victor Appleton GBE KCB FRS  was an English physicist. Nobel Prize winner and pioneer in radio physics, Sir Edward Appleton, studied and was also employed as a Lab Technician at Bradford Technical College from 1909 to 1911.
He won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1947 for his seminal work proving the existence of the ionosphere during experiments carried out in 1924.
title: Edward V. Appleton
